sinhalayan wisu mayim gammanawalata kada pana sinhala badadaru ammalage sita kirikatiya dakwa amu amuwe ghathanaya kala, shrimaha bodhiya awata silsamadan wi siti sinhala upasikawan siya gananak wedi thaba mara damu, kithuluthuwa aluthoya pradeshaye bas nawatha sinhalayan pamanak thora bera iwathata gena kapa kota ghathanaya kala, ahinsaka sinhala kuda samanera himiwaru 37 k kathi ga mara damu demala koti thrastha sanwidhanaye miyagiya koti wenuwen yamek kandulu salayida ohu kawadawath “sujatha” sinhalayek nam wiya nohaki bawa oonama sinhalayek piliganna karunaki.

ga්ramiya dhiwara sanwidhana wisin mehi di janadhipathiwaraya wetha wishesha sandeshayak da bara dun athara jalashawalata awashya mathsya pataw bahalima wadi kirima, dhiwara aampanna laba ganima, jala jiwi wagawan sandaha rajaye idam laba ganima, jalashawala widhimath kalamanakaranaya sandaha niladharin yedawima, dhiwara karmanthaya sandaha awashya yatithala pahasukam saha mulya pa්rathipadana labadima athulu ema siyalu illim kadinamin itu kirimata piyawara ganna bawa pa්rakasha kala janadhipathiwaraya ema illim itu kirima athulu karmanthaye unnathiya wenuwen wadi mudalaka mewara aya waya thulin wen kirimata katayuthu karana bawa sandahan kaleya.

me pasubimedi paludeniya game siduwana purawasthu haniya pilibanda wimarshanaya kirimata warsha 2004.06.24 dathamin yuthu anka em/oo/siech/03 darana amathya warayage liyuma prakarawa, ewakata niyojya purawidya adhyaksha janaralwa siti warthamana purawidya adhyaksha janaral aacharya senarath disanayaka ge danum dimata anuwa purawidya departhamenthuwa wisin mulika gaweshanayak karanu labuweya.
eekata mulika hethuwak wenna aththe kolambaa ha nagarashritha parisarawala hara hama palathakama ida prashnaya thawama bala nopana ekath wenna puluwan.
ee unath wadi wechcha widiya gana nan mage hithata echchara hari na.
rawana yuge idan kanthawo adum ande ehema thama.

“samaja gatalu” pilibanda nuthanawadi kathikawa libaralwadi deshapalana wedikawe, janapriya satan pataya bawata pathwa athi dushanaya, wanchawa, nasthiya saha winaya pirihima ta erehi wima yatin aththe nithiye palanaya padanam kotagath pudgala nidahasa rajyaya wisin thama grahanayata gena athayi yana adahasayi.
